review: the movie was decent it said what it was about and that's what they gave you!! snake queen went looking for kidnapped snake king and did some killing doing so!! in india they worship snakes this one snake god in particular not crazy about  movies involving snakes so i tried to cover my eyes most of the time especially when she changed into  human form gross!!!  one thing about it even though she was in human form she always stayed in snake mode!!! i would recommend it!! thank you!
